TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Utilities extends System.Object
public ref class Utilities abstract sealed

summary.span: Contiene métodos de utilidad que usa MSBuild.

span.span: Contains utility methods used by MSBuild.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string Escape(string unescapedExpression) cil managed
Public Shared Function Escape (unescapedExpression As String) As String

param.name: unescapedExpression
param.span: Cadena que se va a convertir.

summary.span: Convierte la cadena especificada en una sintaxis que permite al motor de [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] interpretar literalmente el carácter.

span.span: Converts the specified string into a syntax that allows the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] engine to interpret the character literally.

returns.span: El valor convertido de la cadena especificada.

span.span: The converted value of the specified string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Ciertos caracteres tienen un significado especial en archivos del proyecto de [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)].Certain characters have special meaning in [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project files. Algunos ejemplos de estos caracteres son los signos de punto y coma (;) y los asteriscos (\*).Examples of the characters include semicolons (;) and asterisks (\*). Para poder usar los siguientes caracteres especiales como literales, debe especificarse con la sintaxis % nn, donde nn representa el valor hexadecimal ASCII del carácter.In order to use these special characters as literals, they must be specified with the syntax %nn, where nn represents the ASCII hexadecimal value of the character. Este método realiza esa conversión.This method performs that conversion.
